data.message: I still do not have the new camera, stories, or anything else. And yes I've updated the app. On iOS. What gives?

replies.message: Hi Michael. You should be able to access Camera if you have the latest version of the app and are using an iPhones 4S and higher or an Android devices with OS 4.1.2 and higher. If you're still having trouble, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2q6R3Gz. -Jessica
Good luck Michael I want to get this junk off
I don't think you're missing much,  I can't stand it , and a lot of other people don't either from what i've read , all their extra add-ons should be optional
Sooo if I downgrade my phone I won't have these awfullll circles all over my page?
The app runs slower with these features that I've yet to use.

Facebook Hi Jessica I'm an accountant has been disabled and sent the identity more than once and a month from now and did not reply by a message from Facebook on my email why? Another account was created and the name changed. The identity was sent. The name was changed. The account was changed and the account was opened for only one day. It was closed again, and an identity confirmation was requested. No one has responded so far.
Oh I'm not as much worried about the features missing as I am that something is up with my account. Since I'm well within the range of having it and still see zero signs of it
